name: Salaban
content:
Salaban was an Arkanian featured in the Song of Salaban, an Arkanian legend. According to the legend, they lost everything after making the wrong choices. In 0 ABY, alien warlord Nuso Esva compared Salaban's story to that of the Human pilot Sorro, who served the warlord after losing his family.
Salaban was mentioned in Timothy Zahn's 2011 novel Choices of One.
